dt: {bc}to receive as return for effort and especially for work done or services rendered
{bc}to bring in by way of return
{bc}to come to be duly worthy of or entitled or suited to
{bc}to make worthy of or obtain for

et: Middle English {it}ernen{/it}, from Old English {it}earnian{/it}; akin to Old High German {it}arnōn{/it} to reap, Czech {it}jeseň{/it} autumn
shortdef: to receive as return for effort and especially for work done or services rendered
to bring in by way of return
to come to be duly worthy of or entitled or suited to

dt: {bc}a run in baseball that scores without benefit of an error before the fielding team has had a chance to make the third putout of the inning

shortdef: a run in baseball that scores without benefit of an error before the fielding team has had a chance to make the third putout of the inning

dt: {bc}the average number of earned runs per game scored against a pitcher in baseball determined by dividing the total of earned runs scored against him by the total number of innings pitched and multiplying by nine

shortdef: the average number of earned runs per game scored against a pitcher in baseball determined by dividing the total of earned runs scored against him by the total number of innings pitched and multiplying by nine

dt: {bc}achieved or acquired through a lot of effort or hard work

shortdef: achieved or acquired through a lot of effort or hard work

meta.id: a penny saved (is a penny earned)
stems: a penny saved (is a penny earned)
a penny saved is a penny earned

hwi.hw: a penny saved (is a penny earned)

dt: used to say that it is important to save money

shortdef: —used to say that it is important to save money
